ModMetaData.name: Mechanoid Assimilation
ModMetaData.author: Sarg
ModMetaData.description:
Creates a whole planet assimilated by mechanoids, using Alpha Biomes Mechanoid Intrusion biome.
<size=24>Features</size>
Creates a whole planet assimilated by mechanoids, using Alpha Biomes Mechanoid Intrusion biome.
<size=24>Issues</size>
This mod will probably overwrite most other biome mods. It SHOULD at least.
<size=24>Compatibility</size>
NOT compatible with any other biome mod Compatible with Alpha Animals (obviously) Compatible with Magical Menagerie Compatible with Dinosauria Compatible with Megafauna Compatible with Animal Collab Project Compatible with Vanilla Animals Expanded Compatible with Camouflage and Stealth Compatible with Fertile Fields Uses Harmony (dependency)
Mods that modify the way the world is generated MAY cause some weird results. Use at your own risk.
<size=24>Changelog</size>
v0.1: Prerelease
